title: mojo.openapi.OAuthFlow
description: Configuration details for a supported OAuth Flow

authorizationUrl.title: Url
authorizationUrl.description: The authorization URL to be used for this flow

refreshUrl.title: Url
refreshUrl.description: The URL to be used for obtaining refresh tokens.

scopes.description:
The available scopes for the OAuth2 security scheme.
A map between the scope name and a short description for it.

tokenUrl.title: Url
tokenUrl.description: The token URL to be used for this flow.
